desc: We want to promote our product by way of Joint Ventures with big influencers.We have a training product "WiFi Security Training Course" that is priced at $159.99 and we want big influencers to sell it to your target audience with the help of coupon codes.We would create a special coupon code for each JV partner who would give that code to his blog readers or email list etc.We would give a big discount to their audience (typically around 60-80%) plus we would share revenues with the influencer too from whatever revenues we get through his/her coupon codes.Our ideal JV partner could be big bloggers and email list owners who maintain good relationship with their lists. The bloggers/email list owners could be in the niche of fintech, heaclthcare, hotel, retail industries - ie their audience would consist of retailers, bankers, financial institutions, hotels, tour operators, startups. The more dependent their industry and operations is on technology, the better.Your role: You would identify big list owners and bloggers in the areas of interest and email them, talk to them about our training program and get them on-board to promote the course. We could help out with queries and consultation but you would need to identify, develop and finalize the deals mostly independently.JV partner's role: They write about the course and offer a discount coupon code to their readers. Their readers are happy with the heavy discount, the blogger/list owner makes money, we sell our products - a win-win for all.The actual discount would be finalized in consultation with the influencer. For example we could offer 70% off to their readers and 15% to the influencer while we retain 15%OR maybe 60% to their audience and 25% to them while we keep just 15% - In all cases we would be happy with 15% and the rest could be split between them and their readers.You need to finalize at least 5 such JV partners. They should have sizeable audience and influence.Here is our product page:[url removed, login to view]And here is a specially created page with 80% discount coupon:[url removed, login to view]This is an ongoing job and we are looking for a long term relationship with good VAs and marketers.
title: Help me with Influencer and blogger marketing outreach for striking JVs with 5 partners

A partner and myself were starting a Cell Phone Company and we purchased every list we could find. We spend $250,000 on working to aquire these lists. The company was sold off and we didn't transfer the Email address as we purchased with our own money and not company funds.The Lists are 100% legal. CAN/SPAM compliant.I am willing to give more Emails as a incentive to close the deal.Also, I will sell each list individually. Not to sell the same list over and over.How much could your customer make if the sold 1 item at $5 to 0.1% (1/10 of 1%) = $25,000So, don't you beleive they would think this is a good investment?To make $5000 you only have to 40 Sales. I pay at close, payment and clearing of each sale.I can ship the list by DVD with Bulk Send Software, SMTP Server Software, and Email Verifiers, and other tools. Plus, I will include best practices to stay legal and CAN/SPAM compliant as well as getting the most from Email Marketing.Payment must be made by Check (Wait till clears), Certified, Credit Card or Paypal.

desc: We're a tech company focusing on building a product that will change health insurance forever. Visit us at [url removed, login to view]!Our team is hard at work on development & operations rollout for our pilot clients and want to bring in expert salespeople to help us with one thing: LEAD GENERATION.We'd like to have you as involved in the sales process as you'd like, but all commissions can be earned by simply cold calling and getting a followup meeting. We believe our product delivers real value and have demonstrated that a second meeting usually converts a lead to a sale. That is why we're willing to give commissions for a sale that originates from a single cold call.Our targets are brokers and PEO's (lists provided) who deal in health insurance. We have a streamlined sales training document that will get you up to speed very quickly and help you get on the phones (the product is simple and easily gets attention).We're offering a pure commission-based structure, based on lead followthrough. When any lead advances through the engagement steps, we will pay the following structure (sequentially):- Followup call scheduled: $1/lead- Engagement meeting scheduled: $25/lead- Engagement agreement signed: $50/lead (<50 employees), $150/lead (50-100 employees), $300/lead (100-250 employees), $500/lead (250+ employees)We are offering no salary outside of commission and you must provide your own equipment for making calls. You will need to work from home.
